version_description:
• Option to Save to Camera Roll, which converts your audio recordings to video and provides another way to share your content
• Support for 24/44.1 kHz and 16/48 kHz
• Expanded AirDrop support between MOTIV apps
• Improved audio processing for the MVL Condenser Lavalier Microphone and other external analog microphones
• Mono recording support for the MV88 cardioid and bidirectional modes
• Improved sharing options

• Sharing options now include the ability to open waveform files in other apps. To find out what apps may accept waveform files on your device, tap the share icon, select “More” and then “Open In.”
• Bug fixes

• Edit your recordings using trim or split options that include adjustable fade curves and markers
• Improved design and interface
• Enhanced meters

• Fixed an issue causing the app to be unresponsive on iOS 10
• Some iPad users may still experience issues on iOS 10
• In rare cases, MV88 may show only one meter in stereo mode
• Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)
Bug fixes

• Improvements to editing
• Option in Settings to keep screen awake while recording
• Recording file size now displayed in full screen playback view
• Mic Setup screen works in Landscape mode
• New recordings now default to time and date filenames
• VoiceOver adjustments and improvements
• Firmware update support for the Remote + Mic Lightning Accessory Cable
• Minor fixes and performance enhancements

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

Fixes a disappearing navigation issue on iPads

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

• Monitoring is enabled again for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus due to customer feedback; however, monitoring over Bluetooth may exhibit quality issues
• If zoomed in on a waveform while editing, adding a marker will keep you in the zoomed-in view
• Improved file names for long recordings
• Updated Dropbox API
• Bug fixes

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

• iOS 11 compatibility
• Bug fixes

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

• Visual improvements for iPhone X
• Bug fixes

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

• Bug fixes

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)
• Bug fixes, including a fix for an issue where feedback emails were not responsive
Demo Mode: See what you can do with MOTIV microphones

• Bug fixes

Having problems? Send your feedback through the app (MOTIV > About > Feedback)

• Arabic support
• Improved support for landscape mode
• Bug fixes

• Support for the MV88+ digital stereo condenser microphone
• Bug fixes
Demo Mode: See what you can do with MOTIV microphones
Bug fixes

• Custom Presets: Save and reuse your favorite mic settings
• Bug fixes
Bug fixes

* Bug fixes
* Accessibility fixes for VoiceOver

* Updated firmware for MV88+
* Bug fixes

• Start and stop recordings with Apple Watch 
• "Recently Deleted" folder
• Bug fixes
Bug fixes

We are constantly working to improve our app to give you a better experience. Every update contains bug fixes and general enhancements. This update also includes:
• Support for the MV7 Podcast Microphone

Thank you for using ShurePlus MOTIV! Your feedback is important to us and will help to improve our app in the future – leave us a review or send us feedback in the app.
